name: Drug
description:
This is a strategy game that was produced in a minigame contest.

In this game we made some conceptual attempts to try to make the player a god instead of any of the opponents.
There is always a confrontation between the bacteria and the cells in the human body. The player will play a third party to decide which side to help. 

There are 3 small levels in the game, namely kidney, lung and brain. At each level, we offer a limited number of drugs for players to make decisions.

In the style of art, we chose the style of Micky and morty, trying to create a fantasy and grotesque feeling.

Although the overall production is not mature enough, I hope you can have fun.
